Author: TurkeysAreFriends
Text: it’s so annoying bc it takes so long of restricting for bloat to go away n to finally be like ok i’m starting to look less like a monster that i’ll look ok for like one day n go right back into a binge cycle

Author: PieldeSapo
Text: I know what you mean, when I'm in a binging phase i look the same, i see no difference from day to day i just look horrible all the time. But when i start loosing and not eating as much you see a difference every time you put something in your mouth. You wake up looking good but as soon as you eat something you bloat etcetc I hate it.
